channel.title: Domains on SandLabs
channel.description: Recent content in Domains on SandLabs

item.title: Artificial Intelligence
item.description: From regression for forecasting, to deep generative neural architectures, to reinforcement learning agents, AI — especially machine learning (ML) — helps us to better unearth hidden insights about the world around us

item.title: Blockchain-based Smart Contracts
item.description: Smart contracts enable new frontiers in decentralized logic execution. We both develop our own smart contracts, as well as analyze industry-wide deployments of smart contracts

item.title: Decentralized Applications (DApps)
item.description: Combining web app frontends with blockchain smart contract backends, DApps help to power some of the most popular blockchain-related services and will serve as the user interface to our smart contract implementations

item.title: Cloud Computing
item.description: For all of our research and development, cloud computing enables us to embrace a serverless architecture, always ready to deploy and scale up

item.title: Data Scouting & Storytelling
item.description: From finding the next best data source, to creating insightful, interactive visualizations, scouting and storying telling is hands-on data work

item.title: Decentralized Finance (DeFi)
item.description: We are collecting DeFi data so we can make implementations such as automated market makers, quantitative finance investment algorithms, and more
